title: The Structure of protein
creator_credit: De La Cheura Films, Unilever Films, George Seager and John Armstrong
brief_description: Describes the composition of an amino acid and shows how these acids form polypeptide chains of which proteins are composed. Briefly discusses the techniques used to determine the precise structure of a protein.
creator_credit_for_label: De La Cheura Films, Unilever Films, George Seager and John Armstrong
